quote: When a man is penalized for honesty he learns to lie. – Criss Jami
fact: In the marriage ceremony of the ancient Inca Indians of Peru, the couple was considered officially wed when they took off their sandals and handed them to each other.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why did Dracula lie in the wrong coffin? He made a grave mistake.
